```{r}
library(eesim)
```

Here's an example of simulating binary exposure data: 

```{r}
season_binexp(5, 0.25)
```

Here's an example of simulating continuous exposure data:

```{r}
season_contexp(n = 5, mu = 100, sd = 10, trend = "cos1")
```
